Libraries:
	glew  : glew-2.1.0-win32
		http://glew.sourceforge.net/

	glfw  : glfw-3.2.1.bin.WIN64; glfw-3.2.1.bin.WIN32
		http://www.glfw.org/

	glm   : glm-0.9.9.0
		https://glm.g-truc.net/0.9.9/index.html

	imgui : github master cloned on 8/13/2018
		https://github.com/ocornut/imgui

	stb   : github master cloned on 7/14/2018
		https://github.com/nothings/stb

	SDL2  : SDL2-devel-2.0.8-VC.zip (Visual C++ 32/64-bit)
		https://www.libsdl.org/download-2.0.php
